meanings.definition: A cry of praise or adoration, especially to God.
meanings.sent1: The church echoed with hosannas as the congregation sang joyfully.
meanings.sent2: The crowd shouted hosannas as the king rode through the streets.
meanings.sent3: The children's hosannas for their favorite ice cream flavor were heard throughout the house.
meanings.sent4: The hosannas of the fans filled the stadium, cheering on their team to victory.
meanings.sent5: The hosannas of the audience filled the theater, praising the actors' performance.

meanings.sent1: The hosannas of the critics were well-deserved for the talented artist.
meanings.sent2: The hosannas of the fans could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The chef's hosannas for his own cooking made everyone in the kitchen laugh.
meanings.sent4: The hosannas of the students filled the classroom, celebrating their teacher's birthday.
meanings.sent5: The hosannas of the community honored the firefighter for his bravery.
